New Records: Glenn Maxwell equalled Rohit Sharma's record for the most T20I hundreds with a century
Key Match Events: Glenn Maxwell scored 120 not out from 55 balls, hitting eight sixes and 12 fours
Post-Match Reflections: Maxwell feels comfortable in this format and is trying to ride his current form as much as possible
Miscellaneous Highlights: Maxwell's innings was the second-highest by a batter coming in at No.4 or below in T20Is
